metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5598 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the MySQL Connector component 2.1.3 and earlier and 2.0.4 and earlier in Oracle MySQL allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related to Connector/Python.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5598` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-mysql.connector - 2.1.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-python package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.5-1').
